results.title: Risk of Non-infectious Uveitis with Metformin Therapy in a Large Healthcare Claims Database.
results.text_hl: Risk of Non-infectious @<m>DISEASE_Uveitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014605 @@@Uveitis@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Therapy in a Large Healthcare Claims Database.

citations.NLM: Sobrin L, Yu Y, Han S, Susarla G, Kempen JH, Hubbard RA, VanderBeek BL. Risk of Non-infectious Uveitis with Metformin Therapy in a Large Healthcare Claims Database. Ocul Immunol Inflamm. 2022 Aug;30(6):1334-1340. PMID: 33683184

results.title: Metformin and retinal diseases in preclinical and clinical studies: Insights and review of literature.
results.text_hl: We then explore the sparse but promising retrospective clinical data on @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s potential protective role in @DISEASE_Diabetic_Retinopathy @DISEASE_MESH:D003930 @@@DR@@@, @DISEASE_Macular_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D008268 @@@AMD@@@, @DISEASE_Glaucoma_Open_Angle @DISEASE_MESH:D005902 @@@POAG@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Uveitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014605 @@@uveitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Amin SV, Khanna S, Parvar SP, Shaw LT, Dao D, Hariprasad SM, Skondra D. Metformin and retinal diseases in preclinical and clinical studies: Insights and review of literature. Exp Biol Med (Maywood). 2022 Feb;247(4):317-329. PMID: 35068220

results.title: Polyphenol-based self-assembled nanoparticles treating uveitis by inflammation-oxidative stress suppression.
results.text_hl: We used a self-assembly strategy to construct multifunctional nanoparticles (EM NPs) by combining @CHEMICAL_epigallocatechin_gallate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C045651 @@@EGCG@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MET@@@ for the synergistic treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Uveitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014605 @@@uveitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Chen H, Yang Q, Li M, Ren M, Liu S, An G, Ren Y, Liu P, Du L, Sun X, Jin X. Polyphenol-based self-assembled nanoparticles treating uveitis by inflammation-oxidative stress suppression. Mater Today Bio. 2025 Aug;33():102052. PMID: 40688683

results.title: Antidiabetic drug metformin suppresses endotoxin-induced uveitis in rats.
